name: senor_diablo
text: RUUUUUUUUUUUDE!!!

name: shinkusan
text: A comment left by shinkusan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by austinceltic, CygnusX-1, woodenteeth)

name: pigeon_street
text: Okay, I need you guys to take panel 12, divide roughly in half horizontally so one part contains Ray and the other contains who I assume to be Sound and Motion. Are you with me so far? Okay, once this is accomplished, senor_diablo will make the picture containing Ray his icon, and then shinkusan will do the same with Sound and Motion. I need you to do this for me. Okay? Please. You must.

name: mattydread
text: The last panel could have been a whole comic itself, IMO.  "I heard he doesn't like music" is stone cold intimidating when told as a tall tale type thing.  It's close to saying he has no remorse for life.

name: howard
text: Seriously. I would not mess with a dude who didn't like music.

name: saint
text: i'm more scared of the fact that he was weaned on chicken milk and cocaine! that is a brew of destruction!

name: norrin
text: Do you know how hard it is to milk a chicken?

name: jlynes
text: Almost, but not quite, as hard as it is to get eggs from a cow.

name: johnnyc
text: Even harder in total silence though.

name: johnnyrocker
text: It's actually quite easy to get eggs from a cow. You just need to have the right tools .

name: redphillip
text: More Science!

name: psquid
text: It's easy to get eggs from a cow, as long as you cheat a little - you just need to put them in the cow first.

name: greyfield
text: Actually, I think that's Roast Beef going around creating mythology sans punctuation.

name: psquid
text: Good call.

name: firesign
text: My boss at the used CD store I worked at in college once found an "I Hate Country Music" bumper sticker, cut the word "Country" off of it, and put it on his car, just to see what the reactions would be. He said he has never gotten more outraged comments from passersby/other drivers about anything else in his life. And he's the type that considers it an achievement to have pissed people off...

name: maniakattak
text: I basically live on music and can be [i]such a pussy[i] sometimes.

name: wehavemagnums
text: Gets a 5 just for that line.

name: catachresis
text: Couldn't have put it better

name: sargasm
text: "The man that hath no music in himself, nor is not moved with concord of sweet sounds, is fit for TREASONs, stratagems, and spoils. The motions of his spirit are dull as night, and his affections dark as Erebus. Let no such man be trusted." -Shakespeare, The Merchant of Venice

name: philophobe
text: Seriously, who wants to get their ass beat down by Plato?

name: carbonation
text: Perhaps even no love for life, either.

name: methadone
text: nothing is more savage then waking up with hennessy and oysters. definition of rude.

name: peppermint
text: I'm personally fond of the chicken milk line.

name: sargasm
text: Through sound and motion, you will be able to paralyze nerves, shatter bones, set fires, suffocate an enemy or burst his organs.

name: heyman
text: You truly are the king of awesome literary and cinematic allusion

name: ivanstrel
text: Dune, 1984.

name: taskmaster
text: RAAAAAAYYYYY! His name is a rude killing word

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tim88, the_doz, Boyd, Darthemed)

name: soticoto
text: I don't care what you ask me the boy's rude

name: straw
text: I'm pretty sure Ray actually does routinely wake up with Hennessey and oysters

name: tellumo
text: Perhaps occasionally, but I think it's usually more like Eggs B. and a bloody, dogg .

name: qwerty
text: I doubt The Rock could have pulled a ruder People's Elbow

name: jackparsons
text: The Rock with a potbelly suit. That's who should play Ray. Watch his SNL skits: the guy is a great comic actor.

name: overmedicated
text: Oh my god he's so right.

name: zeal
text:
Even the voice would work.

I'm starting...I'm starting to get scared, here.

name: tekende
text:
Huh. That's actually not a bad idea.

And yeah, the Rock was hilarious on SNL. The "girl with no gaydar" sketch he was in was classic.

name: tbtabby
text: Randy "Macho Man" Savage would be a better comparison. His signature move was a flying elbow drop not unlike this.

name: soticoto
text: Chubby for truth.

name: thedudeabides85
text: Look at Leander resume his familiar creepy hand-rubbing pose as soon as Ray dismounts, all enamored with Son of Rodney's execution.  For Leander, this is like some sort of fantasy camp where you pay $3000 to spend a weekend hitting softballs lobbed by 1970s Yankees, eventually coming across a passed out Reggie Jackson and turning him onto his stomach so that he doesn't choke on his own puke.

name: luckyg
text: I've always thought that "I...AM...RUUUDE!" would have been much better if it were split up between panels 8, 9 and 10.

name: littlefatdog
text: that's actually true. maybe in twenty years it'll be redone in the special edition dvd.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Hahaha. I'm out of chubbies for this page, but that was good.

name: aaron_haynes
text: I considered posting the same thing. It makes Ray's falling speed in panel 12 feel much slower.

name: patkun
text: Chicken... milk?

name: jackparsons
text: It's a cloaca thing. You wouldn't understand.

name: re5urgam
text: Cloaca. Ew. Ew.

name: redmad
text: The last panel seems to echo Fight Club.

name: soticoto
text: I am Jack's raging bile-duct.

name: cthulhu235
text: Gotta remember to rock the Hennessy and oysters next time I'm somewhere like Hooters.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Alt text: "At least he went out recumbently."

Which raises it to a five.

name: soticoto
text:
Raises it to a 10 at least.
It was at least a 6 even before alt-text.

name: hurfusdurfus
text: He is SO rude.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
i read this as if vlad had said it

"until you are so rude"

name: luckypyjamas
text:
oh shit

who fucked up bb code? i did!

name: lolsworth
text: Blame Assetbar for insisting on ghetto html

name: luckypyjamas
text:
weaned on chicken milk and cocaine

that is pretty damn rude

name: falseprophet
text: I draw great enjoyment from the second to last panel - all you need to see is the ponytail hanging out from below to know that its Sound and Motion in the grips of the crane.

name: echidnaboy
text: That panel is like when a character says "Don't worry, I know what I'm doing" and the movie cuts to a shot of a speeding ambulance.

name: themacktruck
text: "I...AM...RUUUDE!" has become my battlecry in any game or situation that merits one.  I also secretely hope they will be my dying words.

name: bixschmix
text: I also hope to adopt this terminology for future rude-age.

name: boredom_man
text: Mine will be "this is your fault."

name: gethen
text: i love leander's hat and wish to sport one like it.

name: breadcrab
text: Every time Ray says 'rude', for any reason, I laugh. I don't know why.

name: i_love_kate
text:
"Weaned on chicken milk and cocaine?"

I swear this is a Bowie reference.

name: sabata00
text: does leander have a black flag tattoo? that is sweet.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs

Onstad: It has been ten years since college.

name: i_love_kate
text: Possibly the best blog entry I've yet read. Well worth tearing yourself away from the Great Outdoor Fight for.

name: tenthman
text: For some reason Leander reminds me very much of No-No

name: direhaggis
text: I mentioned the same thing in a comment a few strips back, yeah.

name: drago25
text: Achewood has officially given us the best battle cry ever - along with pretty much the best of everything else.

name: ryaldin
text: I like the fact that it takes long enough for Ray to fall from Leander's shoulders, that there is a pause between each letter, and an extensive elongation of the single syllable in rude.  It's Ray's personal rate of gravitational acceleration.

name: milkpants
text: I just noticed the Ponytail of Sound and Motion is hanging out of the clam bucket. :)

name: trap
text: I love how Sound and Motion's eyes open just before Ray Savage's him.

name: mustakrakesh
text: This whole arc is fucking genius.

name: allanpinkerton
text:
"whisper... WHISPER! heh!"

Classic.

name: greenkoolayd
text: rude as in good.

name: twells
text: I heard he sleeps only 1 hour a night and that he was born in a mental asylum

name: atypicaloracle
text: "I am ruuuuuude!" is a fully awesome battlecry.

name: cab234
text: A man who does not like music is not to be trusted.
